adHeader: @@RELAX LET SANTA BE YOUR WINE TOUR GUIDE IN YOUR CAR @$35 PER HOUR!!!
adDetails: Santa Leonard Here! I am a real professional Santa as well as a professional Wine Country Tour Guide. I have a Professional Class "B" License and 8 years of wine tour experience! I can custom tailor a wine tour to your exact specifications! I was borne and raised in the Wine Country so I know it well! I drive either your personal or rental car to save you money and the chance of receiving a DUI! I can provide a great tour in the Alexander Valley, Dry Creek Valley, Russian River Area, Sonoma Valley, Mendocino County or Napa County. Because I am a professional Santa I get finger printed and have a background check every year for your safety. The last ticket I received was in 1974! My rates are very affordable: Just $150.00 for a four hour tour and extra time is just $35.00 per hour plus any gratuity you may wish to add. (Tasting fees are not included) I am sorry I do not take any credit cards and cash is the preferred method of payment. Have fun and leave the driving to SANTA! Please check out my website at: www.winetoursbysanta.com or Email: show contact info or call show contact info for any questions or to book your date
